name: Blaze Brigade
description:
Your job is to extinguish fires by running over them. Collect water to put out more fires and try to beat your high score. Enjoy and rate my game!

This is the first game I have built and released and I developed and designed it myself. This is also my submission for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2 following the theme "chaos".

I used freesound.org for sound effects and music. I also  used a muzzle flash sprite set from bestgamekits
